content.raw:
On principle, I would say that it's nice to use pull requests in order to keep the flow of communication. I respect your decision (which you explained in [sdformat pull request 53](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/53/add-packagexml-to-simplify-building-in/diff)), though I have personally found building in catkin workspaces a convenient development tool.

See also #833 for information on this topic.
